# activationType

**Instance Property**

Specifies what caused a user notification to occur.

## Declaration

```swift
var activationType: NSUserNotification.ActivationType { get }
```

## Discussion

This property specifies why the user notification was sent to to the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotificationCenterDelegate] method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotificationCenterDelegate/userNotificationCenter(_:didActivate:)]. The supported values are described in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification/ActivationType-swift.enum].

## User Notification Activation Method

- **additionalActivationAction**: An additional action selected by the user.
- **additionalActions**: The actions that can be taken on a notification in addition to the default action.
